dataSubsets.sql: ALTER TABLE dukes_2019 ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS iri varchar DEFAULT 'http://www.theworldavatar.com/ontology/ontoeip/powerplants/PowerPlant.owl#PowerPlant/' || substr(md5(random()::text),0,11);

virtualTable.name: dukes_2019_geo
virtualTable.sql: SELECT wkb_geometry, "Site Name" as name, "Technology" as technology, "Type" as type, "Primary Fuel" as primary_fuel, "InstalledCapacity (MW)" as capacity, iri FROM dukes_2019

dataSubsets.sql: ALTER TABLE dukes_2022 ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS iri varchar DEFAULT 'http://www.theworldavatar.com/ontology/ontoeip/powerplants/PowerPlant.owl#PowerPlant/' || substr(md5(random()::text),0,11);

virtualTable.name: dukes_2022_geo
virtualTable.sql: SELECT wkb_geometry, "Site Name" as name, "Technology" as technology, "Type" as type, "Primary Fuel" as primary_fuel, "InstalledCapacity (MW)" as capacity, iri FROM dukes_2022

dataSubsets.sql: ALTER TABLE dukes_merged ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS iri varchar DEFAULT 'http://www.theworldavatar.com/ontology/ontoeip/powerplants/PowerPlant.owl#PowerPlant/' || substr(md5(random()::text),0,11);

virtualTable.name: dukes_merged_geo
virtualTable.sql: SELECT wkb_geometry, "Site Name" as name, "Technology" as technology, "Country" as country, "Type" as type, "Primary Fuel" as primary_fuel, "InstalledCapacity (MW)" as capacity, iri FROM dukes_merged
